name: Enchanted Vertical Slabs
description:
A simple, vanilla-like mod that adds Vertical Slabs to Minecraft.
New in v1.9.3: 
  - Add stonecutting recipes
  - Fixed issues with Waxed Copper Slabs not appearing and acting correctly

New in v1.9.2: 
  - Updated to 1.20.3 and 1.20.4

New in v1.9: 
  - Updated to 1.20
  - Cherry and Bamboo slabs no longer need experiments to be enabled.
